Description: Najran Cement Co (known as: Najran Cement) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2012. Najran Cement operates within the Materials sector focusing on Construction Materials. Najran Cement is based in Najran, Saudi Arabia and was established in October 2005.
